longdesc: looked over the basic of networking, programming, and key terms
Network management is the process of administering and managing computer networks. Levi learned how to managing and routers work.

A network switch connects devices in a network to each other, enabling them to talk by exchanging data packets. Switches can be hardware devices that manage physical networks or software-based virtual devices.

Network Address Translation (NAT) is a service that enables private IP networks to use the internet and cloud. NAT translates private IP addresses in an internal network to a public IP address before packets are sent to an external network

Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) is a client/server protocol that automatically provides an Internet Protocol (IP) host with its IP address and other related configuration information such as the subnet mask and default gateway

The Domain Name System (DNS) is the phonebook of the Internet. Humans access information online through domain names, like nytimes.com or espn.com. Web browsers interact through Internet Protocol (IP) addresses. DNS translates domain names to IP addresses so browsers can load Internet resources.
Went over basic html, learned the introduction to programming, basic commands, etc.
Made a login example with html and JavaScript programming.
Levi set up an external switch device,  the switch is used to send and receive data packages.
after making the login example, Levi was able to use those skills and tips to create a working login screen

Cascading Style Sheets is a style sheet language used for specifying the presentation and styling of a document written in a markup language such as HTML or XML. CSS is a cornerstone technology of the World Wide Web, alongside HTML and JavaScript

Bootstrap is a free and open-source CSS framework directed at responsive, mobile-first front-end web development. It contains HTML, CSS and JavaScript-based design templates for typography, forms, buttons, navigation, and other interface components.
Levi installed vue.js, which is another programming format/type.
went over the basic to JavaScript, Levi has a clear understanding of it.
Levi took some time this week to set up a git account, this will show their work and repository, git allows sync settings.

JavaScript is a programming language and core technology of the Web, alongside HTML and CSS. 99% of websites use JavaScript on the client side for webpage behavior. Web browsers have a dedicated JavaScript engine that executes the client code.

A virtual private network is a mechanism for creating a secure connection between a computing device and a computer network, or between two networks, using an insecure communication medium such as the public Internet.
pre packaged html, css, and javascript packages that are reusable in different applications.
Levi redesigned and updated the server. with adding a dew new features and longer descriptions.

The Secure Shell Protocol is a cryptographic network protocol for operating network services securely over an unsecured network. Its most notable applications are remote login and command-line execution.
Levi installed, setup, and is currently using linux to program and code.
server-side JavaScript engine for running basic javascript on the server.
micro sized virtual machine for running programs, databases, and applications on a server. This is like a tiny iPhone, that still does everything for you.
tool for managing docker containers and stacks. a stack is a group of docker containers composed
